name: Affinity Template
summary: An AFTEMPLATE file is a template created by Serif Affinity Photo, Serif Affinity Publisher, and Serif Affinity Designer applications. It stores a document, which may include one or more pages or artboards, layers, images, text, shapes, strokes, and other elements. Affinity users create AFTEMPLATE files to store documents with content and settings they want to replicate in other Affinity documents.
